Instructions: **Alpha**: A, B, T, W, C, H\n**Email**: alexis.flores@arrow.com
**Alpha**: I, J, K, E, F, #, signs, D, Q, U, V, X, Y, Z\n**Email**: iliana.robles@arrow.com
Rationale: Handles Special Chars and Alpha Group I-Z.

Instructions: **Alpha**: L, P, M, N, O, R, G\n**Email**: valeria.sanchez@arrow.com

1. Search SO# in 'Digital Customer Tab' (SWB) for notes, vendor, and status.\n2. Search SO# in Salesforce to check for cases handled by Support/OMT.\n3. Search PO# in Salesforce for supplier-specific inquiries.
Rationale: Determining if a task is already in progress before opening new cases.

Instructions:
1. Open Digital Customer section from Customer Tab.
2. Search WEB SO or SO number.
3. Click order line to view 'OMT Action Notes'.
4. Note: Release cannot be expedited. OMT coordinates with Credit/Asset/Trade for release.
Rationale: Identifying specific hold reasons (Price, High Value, Asset).

Instructions:
• Price Release: Line price below cost/margin.
• High Value: Order exceeds vetting threshold.
• Asset Review: Stock/Allocation check.
• Trade/Export: Compliance verification.
Rationale: Definitions of internal blocks encountered in SWB.

Instructions:
1. ETQ Portal > All Modules > eRequests.
2. New Document > Warehouse Requests > 'Sure Ship Domestic - Draft'.
3. Whse: V72. Host: AC Prod.
4. Required: SO, Delivery ID (DID), and Line #s.
5. Note: 'Please arrange shipment for DID provided. It has been picked/released since [DATE].'
Rationale: Expediting Reno orders stuck in 'Released' or 'Picked' status for >2 days.

Instructions: 1. ETQ > Warehouse Requests > 'Sure Ship International - Draft'.\n2. Use when tracking is missing in Unity/SWB for shipped international orders.
Rationale: Expediting cross-dock orders at Reno hub.

Instructions: 1. ETQ > Warehouse Requests > 'Receiving Expedite - Draft'.\n2. Required: Supplier PO, Carrier, Tracking, Arrival Date.\n3. Field Trick: If DHL 'Signed By' is unknown, enter 'N/A'.
Rationale: For items delivered to Reno but 'Awaiting Receipt' for >3 days.

Instructions: 1. Open Salesforce Case: 'Expedite Receiving [Supplier PO] / SO[NUM]'.\n2. Email: URGENTRECEIVING.HK@arrowasia.com.\n3. Body: Supplier PO, SO, Supplier, Tracking, Carrier, Arrival Date, MPN, Qty.
Rationale: For HK items delivered but 'Awaiting Receipt' for >3 days.

Instructions: 1. Sure Ship: Email ecommerce.dlc.emea@arrow.com and Helpdeskvenlo.dlc.emea@arrow.com.\n2. Receiving: Email business.support.pdc.emea@arrow.com with tracking/date.
1. MyConnect > 'Report a Digital Issue'.\n2. Provide: URL, Screenshot, WEB-SO, and User Email.\n3. Use for: 'Blocked User' errors if not blocked in SWB.
Rationale: Reporting technical website bugs and account issues.

Instructions: 1. MyConnect > 'Warehouse IT Support - WMS'.\n2. Provide: DID, Whse Code, and Pick Status.\n3. Use for: Packing list reprints, printer errors, or DIDs stuck in 'Ready to Release' (>24h).
Rationale: Technical support for warehouse management systems.

Instructions:
1. Identify unpaid order from 'DROPSHIP REPORT'.
2. Create new SO (Same info, MFR: e.g., MOLEX_WAL).
3. Set Resale to $0.00 and remove Freight.
4. Apply hold: 'Replacement SO; reaching out to [SUPPLIER] for PO Cancellation'.
Rationale: Required when original dropship SO cannot be billed by AP.

Instructions: 1. Get PO# from Info > Drop Ship (after 30m).\n2. Email: delink and rematch invoices@arrow.com (CC Sophia Ciarlo).\n3. Body: 'Hello - Please confirm receipt of replacement Dropship Order D[NUMBER] to pay [SUPPLIER] for Invoice #[NUMBER].'
Rationale: Linking new POs to supplier invoices for payment.

Instructions: 1. Email: verical-logistics@verical.com (CC amunoz@arrow.com, jawells@arrow.com).\n2. Template: 'Could you please provide MFG CoC for WEB-SO: / PO: / DID: / MPN: / Line: / Regards.'
Rationale: Specific workflow for Nogales warehouse documentation.

Instructions: 1. Reno Packing List: https://wms-prod.arrow.com/PAWMSReprints/\n2. Non-Military CoC: https://arrow.tfaforms.net/4865283\n3. Military Parts: arrowcrm.my.salesforce-sites.com/arrowservices
Rationale: Direct access for document reprints and compliance.
